text: @Mike_Pence Quit the lying. Why are you telling people #COVID19 is on its way out? You are doing everyone a disservice and will get people #killed. This is why you and #Trump need to be shown the exit. It’s not the time to say it’s over. And to quote yourself? Ridiculous.
